titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the St. Andrew's Episcopal Church, Jackson, Mich. records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: St. Andrew's Episcopal Church, Jackson, Mich. records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: St. Andrew's was organized September 18, 1966 in the northwest area of Jackson, Michigan as a project of Christ Church in Pleasant Lake.
archdesc.scopecontent: Registers of baptisms, marriages, communicants, burials, and confirmations; registers of church services; and miscellaneous membership information.
